full_summary:
# Procurement Announcement for Cyber Protection Services

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015775
**Amendment Number:** 1

## Brief Description

A canvass of Indigenous Businesses is being held by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), pertaining to procurement of Cyber Protection Services under Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS).

**Tender Closing Date:** January 3, 2023 at 14:00. 

The procurement is only available for Indigenous Businesses as per the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB).

## Description of Requirements

PWGSC, through its Digital Services Branch (DSB) and Cyber Security Directorate (CSD), requires the services of IT Security Professionals to bolster and augment the existing IT Security community within PSPC while the IT Security Program expands its role and presence. 

The services required include IT security information technology (IT) talent, consisting of a minimum of four (4), level 2 resources.

## Tender Conditions

- The procurement is only available for IT Security Professionals with the required level of certification.
 
- Bidders must submit a bid for all resource categories.

- The successful bidder(s) will be expected to engage in the provision of Information Technology (IT) Services and Cyber Security under the provisions of the Agreement.

**Notice and Attachments**

This procurement notice and attached documents may be accessed from the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca. Please consult the notice at the following URL: <your link to the document>

**Public Works and Government Services Canada**

You can reach out to Kristen Bell-Lalonde at kristen.bell-lalonde@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any questions or concerns about this procurement. Please note that the Contact Information listed on this page is only for the identified reason and responsibility.  All other inquiries or complaints related to this procurement opportunity should be directed to PSPC's Contract and Procurement Office.  # PSPC # Procurement Tories for a strong and better Canada.
